publishedfiledetails.title: ArmaForces - Medical
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]Introducing ArmaForces Medical System.[/h1]
- More efficient bandaging
- Bandages are more durable, stay for even 30 minutes if applied right bandage on correct wound!
- All medical actions take less time to complete
- New pain fighting medication - Apap - with no side effects!

[h2]Decreased treatment times[/h2]
- Bandaging time / 2
- Applying Tourniquet 7 -> 2.5 s
- Removing Tourniquet 7 -> 1.5 s
- Splint 7 -> 5 s
- IV 12 -> 5 s

[h2]Reworked bandages[/h2]
- All bandages are at least 2-3 times more efficient than in standard ACE
- 3 types of efficiency (standard ACE bandages are maximum at 2)
  - Super - 10-8 base efficiency
  - Increased - 6-4 base efficiency
  - Standard - 2-4 base efficiency
- Much longer wound opening times, especially for super efficiency
  - Super - 10% opening chance, 10-30 minutes durability
  - Increased - 30% opening chance, 6-20 minutes
  - Standard - 40% opening chance, 5-10 minutes

[h2]Pain fighting medication (Apap) without side effects[/h2]
- A bit weaker than morphine (0.6 vs 0.8 pain fighting force)
- Effect lasts for up to 10 minutes (vs 30 for morphine)
- Only for conscious units (so morphine is still viable)

[h1]Future plans:[/h1]
We first want to adjust mod to our gameplay and style, possible changes/tweaks in:
- action times
- bandages efficiency
- medications effects

[h1]Source:[/h1]
https://github.com/ArmaForces/Medical

[h1]Other ArmaForces addons:[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1643238133
